text: Les Thomas (28 May 1906 – 13 August 1997) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Les Thomas's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1906 births Category:1997 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from South Australia Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:West Adelaide Football Club players Category:Sturt Football Club players
title: Les Thomas (footballer)
